comments.comment:
bridge (optional)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
One Body One Spirit
One Faith One Lord
One People One Nation
Praise Ye the Lord

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord
And greatly to be praised
In the city of our God
In the mountain of His holiness

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Beautiful for situation
The joy of the whole earth
Is mount Zion
on the sides of the north
The city of the great King

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Is mount Zion
on the sides of the north
The city of the great King

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Let's go up to Zion
Let's go up to Zion
Let's go up to Zion
the city of our God

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
There's oil and wine in Zion
There's oil and wine in Zion
There's oil and wine in Zion
the city of our God

verse.name: b1b
verse.lines:
One Body One Spirit
One Faith One Lord
One People One Nation
Praise Ye the Lord
